feed.title: Channel-Port aux Basques - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 1:30 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -11.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -17.3°C
Wind: NW 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm except locally 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
